docs.lead_paragraph: Jason Collins, who played his first home game with the Nets on Monday, has gained fame for his sexual orientation, but his contributions on the court are often overlooked.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column holds that Jason Collins, who played his first home game with the Brooklyn Nets, has gained fame as NBA's first openly gay player, but his contributions on the court are often overlooked.

headline.seo: Jason Collins Brings Nets More Than Just Publicity
headline.main: With a Barrier Broken, the Intangibles Emerge
